english.segment1: Today is a celebration. When we live to see the church reach new heights. We dedicate this new territory. To God, we have, lift off
english.segment2: There's no gravity between you and me. Let's go to a place where there's no time or space. And the Holy Spirit has got me so high. Ooh, this must be what Heaven is like
english.segment3: This earthly atmosphere can't contain me. You might as well lift your praise and go with me. The only way to explain this to you. I'm havin' church on the moon
english.segment4: Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon
english.segment5: We all can say we lived to see God do the impossible. The church is officially on the moon
english.segment6: Yeah, I'm out of this world, moving in the speed of light. New territories surrounded by His glory. Uplifting me to a place I've never been before. Got me flyin' higher than a eagle that ever soars
english.segment7: This earthly atmosphere won't restrain me. You might as well lift your praise and go with me. Only way I can explain it to you. I'm havin' church on the moon
english.segment8: Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon
english.segment9: Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon
english.segment10: From way up here, my problems look so small. And I'm not worried, no, God ain't gonna let me fall. I got a flag in my hand, I'ma set it down right here. And the world will know me and you at church on the moon, yeah
english.segment11: We're havin' church, we havin' church on the moon. We're havin' church, we havin' church on the moon. We're havin' church, we havin' church on the moon. We're havin' church, we havin' church on the moon
english.segment12: Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon
english.segment13: Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon. Church on the moon,Church on the moon
english.segment14: We're now all witnesses to the power of God. We are astounded of this phenomenon. They said that we couldn't do it. But our praise has taken us somewhere we've never been before
english.segment15: We're havin' church, we're havin' church on the moon. We're havin' church, we're havin' church on the moon. We're havin' church, we're havin' church on the moon. We're havin' church, we're havin' church on the moon.
